documents.document: a great, great hotel As a self proclaimed, highly critical hotel lover, this place was great. I chose the peak view king with an oriental motif on a high floor, and it was spacious, beautifully furnished with spectacular architectural details and abolutely amazing lighting, especially in the bathroom.The service was great--Asian hospitality at its best. We've stayed at many of the great hotels in the world, including 25 different 4 Seaons and this hotel along with the George V stands above them all. A great, great hotel
